_sText:
Surf And Destroy

By ZaLoS

CTs: Go defend Bombsites A & B

Ts: Go DESTROY THEM

Jail: Falling off in the first sections will send you to nub jail :P

Failing once you have chosen a path will send you to normal jail. The only way to leave this jail is with blood or some destruction :D



Credits:
Thanks to PPP Surf Server, Krang, Adee, 
www.solidsurf.info, www.fpsbanana.com, Buck Nasty, Midnight Killah, and all the testers!


Id recomend, at most, 38 players tho, I put in more spawn points than that.
